name: Windows Movie Maker Project
summary: Learn about .MSWMM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Windows Movie Maker allows the user to combine and edit content saved within an MSWMM file. Once the movie is finished, it can be exported in a standard video format or burned to a DVD.
You can convert an MSWMM file to a .WMV file, which is a more common format, using Window MovieMaker:
Windows Vista - Open the MSWMM file by selecting File → Open Project. Then select [m[File → Publish Movie[/m] and follow the prompts to save the file as a WMV file.

Windows 7 - Open the MSWMM file by selecting File → Open Project. Then, drag the project to the timeline and click "Save to my computer", which is under "Finish Movie" in the left pane. Then follow the prompts in the wizard to save the file as a WMV file.
You can also convert MSWMM files using Wondershare Video Converter. With this program, you can convert the project to more popular formats, such as .MP4, .AVI, .FLV, .MOV, .DVD, .VOB, an .MPG.

instructions:
To open an MSWMM (Movie Maker Project) file, you need to use the Windows Movie Maker application. Here are the steps to open an MSWMM file:

Open Windows Movie Maker.Go to the “Home” tab and click on “Open project.”Select the MSWMM file you want to open.The project will be loaded into the Windows Movie Maker and you can now edit or export the movie project.

Please note that an MSWMM file is not a video file, but rather a project file that contains information about the arrangement of video clips, photos, and audio tracks in a movie project. You need to use Windows Movie Maker to edit the project and export it as a video file format such as WMV or MP4 to be played on media players.

To convert an MSWMM (Movie Maker Project) file to WMV (Windows Media Video), you need to use the Windows Movie Maker application. Here are the steps to convert an MSWMM file to WMV:

Open Windows Movie Maker and load the MSWMM project.Go to the “Home” tab and click on “Save movie.”Select “For computer” and then choose “WMV” as the file format.Follow the on-screen instructions to save the movie project as a WMV video file.

Once the MSWMM project has been saved as a WMV file, it can be played on a variety of media players that support the WMV format, as well as uploaded to websites such as YouTube or Vimeo for sharing with others.
